TEI.2.document_title: John P Coles to Anthony Butler, 07-15-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: John P. Coles to Anthony Butler, July 15, 1833. Austin's influence in Texas will be dead if he fails through lack of sufficient effort to obtain the reforms petitioned for by the convention of April, 1833.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This letter was recently acquired by the University of Texas. Whether Butler ever received it is uncertain.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 988

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*John P. Coles to Anthony Butler, July 15, 1833. Austin's influence in Texas will be dead if he fails through lack of sufficient effort to obtain the reforms petitioned for by the convention of April, 1833.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="07-15-1833">15th July 1833.*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned* goes to *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*with an application from the *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, for a state sepperate from *location_mentioned*Couhala*/location_mentioned*, the application is made by a *person_mentioned*Convention of the people of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, and in reference to a decree of the Constituent Congress of the *location_mentioned*Mexican Federation */location_mentioned*under date of the *date_mentioned n="05-07-1824">7th May 1824.*/date_mentioned* If this application should fail an Effort will then be made as the Constitution provides, as we believe that we have a constitutional number of *location_mentioned*Inhabitants */location_mentioned*to Entitle us to that privaleage. *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned*'s sincerity in this matter is much doubted by many *person_mentioned*people in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* I hope however that *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*will not forget himself and his *person_mentioned*Friends */person_mentioned*He is Closely watched and his future prospects depend greatly upon his Conduct in this matter.*/p*
*p*If he succeeds he will do well for himself and If for the want of proper Exertion on his part the application should fail *person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned* will be a *person_mentioned*Burned man*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*If you have it in your power to aid the object of *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*in ther application to the *person_mentioned*Mexican Congress*/person_mentioned* you will Confer a favour on all by givin[g] your aid. Nothing but a *person_mentioned*State Government*/person_mentioned* will save *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*and that would soon make it *location_mentioned*one of the most flourishing State [s] in the Republick*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jno P Coles*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] Al *person_mentioned*Señor Coronel D Antones Butler Ministro de *location_mentioned*los Estados Unidos de America*/location_mentioned* en *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
